website_summaries.verdict: Satisfied owners praise this TV's performance and clarity, noting it's a solid deal compared to similarly priced competitors.
pros: We can't get enough of this TV's full-screen LED light distribution and its reliable WiFi connection
cons: The accompanying stand is lightweight and flimsy, and at least one customer had the TV tip over

website_summaries.verdict: Just okay at its price point, newer smart TV users may struggle with initial setup, and its lag time while using apps can be frustrating.
pros: Good picture quality, once calibrated, and HD quality is good
Sound is adequate for most owners, with preselects available to improve its quality
cons: Some reports of TV not working out of the box
Numerous reported issues with picture problems
Smart TV apps work very slowly and crash frequently
A few reports of dead pixels

website_summaries.verdict: Works nicely for sports programming, gaming, and action movies with a 240 Hz refresh rate.
pros: Desirable price point versus other 40-inch TVs
Uses a full-array LED backlight, so you’ll have a uniform image across the entire screen
Includes multiple pre-loaded apps, so you can use the smart TV features immediately
cons: Doesn’t have the longevity of some more expensive TV models

customer_reviews.title: Fine until the warranty ends, then turns into junk.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good purchase in the first year. THEN began to turn off for no reason, and occasionally turn ON when I was asleep or away on vacation! Finally at 17 months old it suddenly won't turn stay on when turned on. What a POS. Shouldn't a TV last more that a year? One user, no abuse, quiet rural location. Disappointed, VIZIO!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Outback Kampers

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tv for 6 months and lately the screen will blackout and turn off, then turn on again. Other times the picture will just freeze up or the colors on the screen will completely mess up. A year later: Still doing the same thing. Worst pricey purchase ever. If I could give negative stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: the picture quality is good but the sound is poor there is static in ...
customer_reviews.text: the picture quality is good but the sound is poor there is static in the sound all of the time it gets really loud when turn up the volume it gets really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: It's a piece of crap; should last longer than a year
customer_reviews.text: The sound has now gone completely out. Started to crackle about a week ago and slowly decayed to nothing. I was warned about Vizio name brand but believed the reviews. It's a piece of crap; should last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Texaxe

customer_reviews.title: Engineered to Fail
customer_reviews.text: 22 months old and the backlights are failing. 2 zones all the way across have gone out, resulting in dark bands. I am convinced the various Vizio D models are engineered to fail soon after getting out of their 1 year warranty period. I have another 32" model in the same series that I purchased a week before this one, and the backlight started to flicker about 2 weeks ago, a week before this one had problems. Never again will I buy Vizio products.
customer_reviews.author: Biomortis

customer_reviews.title: Minor Bug
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but unfortunately I have become spoiled by my 55" Vizio UHD screen, which "upscales" HD signals. One bug with this unit is that every so often when I switch it on, it acts like my HDMI signal is bad with a "does not support resolution" message. When I unplug and replug the HDMI cable, the Visio is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Backlight failing after less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The picture was great for about a year-and-a-half and then the LEDs on the sides of the TV started to fail and these black streaks were appearing. Of course that's after the warranty expired and I read up on it and apparently Vizio and some other manufacturers use cheap LEDs. Basically designed obsolescence. The picture was good until this started happening. I have owned an LG TV for three and a half years and haven't had this problem or really any issue with it. So my next TV will be LG
customer_reviews.author: peter Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The TV was very easy to set up. I set it up in about 5 minutes. The legs go on very easily. The smart features are also very easy to use. You just have to click a button on the remote. They included batteries with the remote which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ben-Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Very happy but the remote stinks
customer_reviews.text: I really love our new TV, easy and quick set up...(I did it all by myself when the husband was out of town)...awesome picture and sound...only complaint is the remote control has no lights at all (the buttons do not light up) so it poses a frustrating situation when trying to channel surf or whatnot when the husband is sleeping. Tilting the remote hoping the light from the TV will illuminate the buttons enough for me to see - it doesn't BTW) Who'd know this was such an irritation? But it is Lol! Is there another remote you could send? Otherwise very very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have read all the reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is my first and last Vizio TV. The TV goes black for no apparent reason, the screen now has black spots all over the screen and the sound quality is not good. When watching movies, the built in speakers make a humming sound making the words almost unintelligible. The TV worked well for the first year. I have been tolerating the sound, screen and shut offs now for another year and a half. I have decided to buy a new TV even though it's not in the budget and guaranteed it will not be this brand.
customer_reviews.author: J H Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for my use for over 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV in 2016. The speakers aren't the best in the TV but I use external speakers with it so it's not a problem for me. I have the 24 inch and it is exactly the right size I needed and was light / easy to mount. The picture quality is good. It only has 1 HDMI input but that's enough for my needs as I use it with Roku. I have not had any problem with this television. It was a good buy. I see they have a newer model now with an extra HDMI port and 1080P instead of 720P Resolution but I don't have any issue with 720P for this size TV.
customer_reviews.author: SoulsSong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a computer screen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this screen, I bought it for a 2nd monitor for my computer and it rocks it out! I already had a Samsung now about 4 years old (which I like well enough, love Samsung as a rule) but the dynamic colors of the Vizio puts the Samsung to shame. The colors are brighter and the contrast is perfect for a computer screen. Glad so far that I bought it. As I love long term updates on items, I'm sure I will be updating after around 6 mos or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 11 months and 6 days.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this TV almost a year to this date of review. Worked fine until 2 days ago. Switched it on, no picture, nothing. All cables etc. Connected and plugged in to working outlet. No picture, snow, anything. Very disappointed, mad, frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Ilynea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for price with small issues.
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest 4k you will find. I use for a computer monitor with no issues. Can have 4 internet tabs open just like having 4 20" monitors in front of me. Only issue is the back light bleed. When there is one solid color you can see different sections of back light. It is mostly only notivable when one solid color is being displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W.

customer_reviews.title: Lack of apps. Internet doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Lack of apps including HBO. Should've just bought the Roku tv. Roku has many more app options. This tv doesn't even have the ability to download more apps. Internet barely works. Took an hour and a half just to watch 15 mins because of all of the buffering.
customer_reviews.author: blurr

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality and size great, volume subpar.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tv a lot, the resolution and quality are great but the volume is so-so. We have to turn the volume up very high on the tv to get clear sound. We may have to invest in a separate speaker system, which I did not anticipate having to do. Overall, worth the price but not completely satisfied with volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speakers went out and ETMIND refuses to let me return it.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful TV! Picture is clear and brilliant colors. Setup was really easy! UPDATE: After just over 3 months, the speakers sound rattly and I cannot stand to listen to this TV anymore. ETMIND refuses to allow me to return the TV. I guess I will have to buy a sound bar. This is really cheap of them considering it has only been a few months. It should last longer than that!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with my TV probably because of shipping damage but the seller quickly supplied me with a replacement and it worked great this TV is nice especially if your a gamer I was scared that the resolution would be to low for my ps4 but it actually has a native resolution of 1080i so it can automatically format to whatever resolution the game is your playing I'd reccomend this TV to anyone it's very affordable and high quality
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty impressed when I started using it - the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a 19' tv which I was using as a computer moniter/tv. I was pretty impressed when I started using it - the picture quality is noticeable better (than the three plus year old predecessor), I'm using an indoor antenna and it picks up 18 of the 24 stations my living room tv does (vs the 11 the old one got). It fit's my need's (and my desk) very well!
customer_reviews.author: sabre03

customer_reviews.title: This TV is fantastic. I've had a 32" Vizio for the past ...
customer_reviews.text: This TV is fantastic. I've had a 32" Vizio for the past 6 years, and it withstood the test of time. This TV arrived in perfect condition. It took all of 2 minutes to take it out of the box and attach the stand. Picture quality is incredible. Love the SmartTV functionality as well! Just click the "Netflix" button on the remote and the TV turns on and enters Netflix. Pretty much what we all want in life, right? Highly recommend to those looking for an inexpensive quality TV. By no means do you need to spend double for a different brand with the same functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tv great options, so so wifi reception.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The Wifi seems to be a bit finicky. Tablets work fine in the same area, but the tv doesn't grab it quite as well. Bought a range extender and we have had ZERO problems since. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jawabba

customer_reviews.title: One year in, still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this TV for a year now and it still looks amazing. Motion is very fluid. The colors are vibrant. I would highly recommend this tv to anyone in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when we finally opened this item. I work at a school and the television arrived in June, so we stored it in a closet that wasn't opened all summer. When we finally opened it, the television had a crack in it. I think I messaged someone concerning it, but never received any help or clarity on it. We had to chalk it as a loss.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV
customer_reviews.text: My first Smart TV - happy with the options and it was very easy to set up to WiFi - just follow the onscreen instructions or the enclosed booklet is easy to understand too. I agree with some of the other reviewers in that the factory set color/picture is really off and I am still working on getting it to my liking. Would have given this TV 5 stars if not for that issue. I am very happy with the Vizio brand, as I have bought several now. Will buy again, as the price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Beav

customer_reviews.title: Don't even think about buying this tv!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of buying, i started facing all sorts of weird issues with the tv: - Remote is awful. Turning on the tv itself won't work everytime. - Live Streaming from Youtube tv etc would stop every now and then and eventually lag behind live transmission a lot. - Smart menu is so sluggish and tests patience - Volume control would completely disappear sometimes. To fix the problems, you will have to plug the power cable out and reinsert. After doing this so many times, i got fed up and ordered an LG tv. Not worth the few bucks you save.
customer_reviews.author: Ramani

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a PC monitor and it works well enough. Sometimes the screen will go black for a second or 2 for seemingly no reason at all. If I turn this monitor off all the icons on my desktop will rearrange I've heard this is an issue with windows in general, but I've always had a multiple monitor set up of multiple sizes and resolutions and never experienced the issue until I used this one. It looks great when gaming and text is readable
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: An very good monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality monitor. I'm only using it with a Blue-ray disk player, but it would serve as a top-notch unit with a full cable or internet hookup with all the applications, bells and whistles any geek heart desires. The screen size is great for across-the-room viewing or on a desktop. I use the sturdy-plastic feet that came with the unit, but the monitor is also wall-mountable (wall mount not included). The on-board speakers are just so-so, but I only use the monitor with a pair of Audio-Technica over-ear studio-reference headphones, so the sound quality is full-spectrum and crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Mike

customer_reviews.title: Some "smart" TVs are dumb
customer_reviews.text: The picture and sound are good, but the SmartCast quality, beware. You use your smartphone or tablet, but the connection doesn't stay connected, and the picture becomes pixilated on and off. Maybe it's me, but I have super-fast home wifi, so I shouldn't have such poor quality casting. I'd recommend just getting a box and streaming through it. Also, the manual you have to download is outdated, so what it tells you is different from the updated software on the television itself.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. Wexford

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poor viewing angle. Had to go through a lot of time and adjustments to get the color decent. Screen went black a couple of months after purchase Calling customer service did not solve the problem A service tech will have to stop by to resolve On a positive side VISIO has a very good customer service. You get to speak to a real person without musc delay
customer_reviews.author: P.Q

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is really good as well and I didnt find that I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is clear and crisp and runs my PS4 games very smoothly. Sound quality is really good as well and I didnt find that I needed a sound bar; it sounds just as nice without one. Overall I am very happy with the product and havent found any cons.
customer_reviews.author: Madisan McKenna

customer_reviews.title: SmartCast finicky & Slow, remote batteries change is a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: SmartCast takes way too much time to load! The screen navigation is way too clumsy. The remote design is horrible! Somehow you have to pry open the complete back of the remote via a tiny slot at the base. There are no visible seams on the side which gives the impression that you are breaking the whole damn remote . They have tutorials on how to change their various remotes but guess what this model remote is OMITTED! I had to open a support case for call back for advisement . Really ? That BAD ! We’ve never had that problem before.
customer_reviews.author: richard schulte

customer_reviews.title: Great TV needs more HDMI.
customer_reviews.text: The Vizio D24 is very bright. I like a bright screen so this was a great find for me. The fact that it has Wi-Fi was a bonus. Now I can stream right to my TV. I wish it had more HDMI ports, but I guess for the size it is not meant to be a main TV. The usb port is great for transferring movies or pics from your computer. I am not a huge fan of the dual foot base, but still looks good on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: mwiddoes

customer_reviews.title: I mounted it with a wall mount and it has a great picture.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 months old granddaughters' room at our house and she loves it. My wife plays Youtube videos for toddlers on it. I mounted it with a wall mount and it has a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of trades

customer_reviews.title: Freezes All The Time
customer_reviews.text: It kept freezing. I called Vizio 3 times to resolve the issue, but it just couldn't get fixed, so I sent it back. The seller wouldn't cover the shipping, which was very surprising since the TV was defective. Thankfully, Amazon CS credited me back the shipping charge. The replacement TV (TCL brand) works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tv purchase online
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly of TV on the stand, four screws only. Picture is nice & features are easy to use. The TV is very light for the size. The only negative for me is the remote is small & easy to misplace but issue is very minor.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Our TV came early witch was nice came Friday instead of Wednesday
customer_reviews.text: Our TV came early witch was nice came Friday instead of Wednesday. The size is perfect for our apartment we got the 43" we had to buy a new stand cause ours was to small so we got a 50" black cherry stand. TV was easy to set up. The sound isn't great we might have to buy surround sound speakers. Everything comes in clear. All around happy with it just not the sound shouldn't have to put the volume so high.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Leideritz

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year Lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: This TV died on me 1 week after the 1 year warranty expired. Perpetually stuck in Test Mode, flashing between primary colors and Black, White & Grey. I have looked at all the potential fixes online about this issue and after hours of trying, can only conclude the main board has failed. I know it is inexpensive for what it is, but 1 year lifespan is ridiculous. I am only giving it two stars because for the 375 days I had it, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob A. Bivaletz-Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps resetting now unusable
customer_reviews.text: Got this in 2017 (writing review in April 2020) tv was working fine yesterday now it constantly reboots, tried the steps online no effect, tried to factory reset also no effect. My TV is now useless after 3 years. Can't imagine I have any warranty either.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Earley

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Tried to reach out to customer support when I bought the tv, there were crickets. Tried to reach out again a couple weeks later, same thing. The box was completely beat up and bent and there are weird lines on the screen when it's on. Also, there is major discoloration on half of the screen. DO NOT BUY... Unless you love terrible quality and terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a product I would buy again! Do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a product I would buy again! Do not buy this as a "smart" TV. It does not allow you access to any streaming other than that provided by the installed VIZIO apps. Secondly Wi-Fi receiver appears to be of a very low quality not connecting at all or constantly buffering. Other devices as computer, IPhone, IPad, and Roku receive and work perfectly in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: Sweeny

customer_reviews.title: Defective product - company refuses to take responsibility.  SHAMEFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Vizio: You sold me a TV with a defective module for 4k@60 on June 8th 2016, through Amazon. I could not have known of the defect while under warranty as I owned no device that supported 4k@60hz. Your company is now refusing to take responsibility. This looks very bad for you.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Four years old
customer_reviews.text: I'm a avid movie watcher, so the tv has been on all the time for four years. It still looks and sounds the same as when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: gary bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love the Picture
customer_reviews.text: Love my new TV. Picture is great! Once I got used to the Menus and set it up the way I like, It's a hoot. Funny thing, I haven't had a TV for a few years, and once I hooked up the Antenna, and Chromecast, I used my new Tech to watch several episodes of "The Beverly Hillbillies". Later , I watched some show in 1080 or above. Wonderful. And lots of good Vizio Apps.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS R LUCUS

customer_reviews.title: Great Internet TV for a kids room
customer_reviews.text: Great for a kids room TV. We do not use it for over the air or cable only internet. Wireless works great from across the house. They have Netflix but watch mostly YouTube videos but everything load fast. Very happy would buy more. haven't had any issues
customer_reviews.author: L. Duginski Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV & Priced Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why anyone would give this TV a "POOR" review, but I found that this item is more than excellent. Simple setup and just what I was looking for. I finally got rid of my old 25 inch TUBE TV. YIKES! The thing weighed a ton. I have had no issues with this item - none what so ever. Picture is awesome and the perfect size for my media room. I have no complaints, only praise! Affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Modbeat1964

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD TV
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this TV on line and received it in one day and a half , that's what I call service.This is a great TV for a low price, picture is very sharp and clear sound is OK but, I had a sound bar which I prefer. Set up was very simple it was remove from the box plug in choose your settings and in about 10 minutes your able to enjoy your TV. I subscribe to Amazon Prime and this is a smart TV this gives me many extras to use. I am more then satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBird

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my son's room for over 2 years now with no problems at all. He's has plugged and unplugged gadgets to the port and it's held up. I have since bought a second one and might buy a third now. I definitely recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Winn

customer_reviews.title: Under the kitchen cabinet with an inch to spare.......
customer_reviews.text: Under the kitchen cabinet with an inch to spare. Better viewing at night, less reflection on screen. So far, works as expected. Cannot hook up to my Kindle to watch videos. Some conflicting data about whether or not a mini cable would work. Amazon says no, You Tube says yes, so I passed. I finally got the Verizon remote to take over from the Vizio remote, although it took repeated input of the Verizon code. Good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: MizEm, Queens, NY

customer_reviews.title: But this was shipped from California and I was shocked when it arrived in perfect shape. The box wasn't scuffed or nicked up
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the shipping was a little slow but I was not in need of it quickly. But this was shipped from California and I was shocked when it arrived in perfect shape. The box wasn't scuffed or nicked up. The tv is great. We are very, very pleased with it. That is all we have in three houses are Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Junk tv. Lasted less than 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: Junk TV. Lasted less than 4 years. Vizio says no extended warranty, you’re on your own. No way I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Applelava

customer_reviews.title: Great as a dedicated gaming TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV strictly for my Xbox One. Out of the box colors were a bit too saturated for my liking. But after calibration.. I couldn't be happier. There is a website that provides all the calibration numbers you need if it becomes overwhelming. I tried them out before my calibration and I pretty much ended up with the same numbers. Movies also show great and the sound won't blow you away but it isn't terrible. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Volkan

customer_reviews.title: Sound is horrible otherwise a good little TV.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the small TV because we needed it to fit inside a cabinet. It is adequate enough. The picture is good and we like the smart features but the sound quality is terrible-very tinny. I’ll probably have to get a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a nice color display
customer_reviews.text: Not a nice color display, tried all settings yet picture is gloomy looking, as if there is grey cast over...not like my other Vizio sets in the home at all....If I kept the box I would have returned it for sure, took for granted and discarded the box before setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon !

customer_reviews.title: A good small TV for close up needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great little TV. Mounted it to the wall in my room, so it's less than 5 feet away. I would not use this for a room where you will be much further away than 10 feet, as some details in the picture will be too small to make out. This tv works great for my purposes but I will need a larger one if I ever need to entertain others.
customer_reviews.author: Cree81v3N4m3

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back...... ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back....... it kept turning off in the middle of me watching it ...... never will I buy refurbished again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Picture quality is amazing for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. Picture quality is amazing for the price and audio has custom EQ available I've managed to make this sound like $60 computer speakers. Built in Netflix and Hulu is great plus and no wires hanging down since it's over wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nussbaum

customer_reviews.title: Nice and portable
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, clear picture and works great. I have had several VIZIOs over the years and have never had a problem with any of them. All still work as they did when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: needs a soundbar
customer_reviews.text: We love everything but the sound. If you are buying this T.V. I'd suggest also getting a soundbar. The speakers on this are on the back and turned downward so the sound is not clear at all. Spend an extra $79 up front and get a Vizio 29 in soundbar and you will love it......
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rymer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV but don't even touch the screen
customer_reviews.text: the stand needs to be improved on these TV's, I lost a year old one because it tipped and I caught it with the tips of my fingers and it ruined the screen, all the boards and the whole TV are sitting now, However love this TV so bought another one. But it will be anchored and I wont go near it without someone helping me. For the money its great, and I love the older style before they came out with the new system
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Use Amazon to compare TV prices NOT to buy the damned things.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered a day late by UPS and the outside box looked like it had been kicked by a rhino. Yes, it works so far but not committing to a lasting love of this TV. Last time I order a TV by delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Cazamatic

customer_reviews.title: propinquity
customer_reviews.text: bought it for some good friends who had (still have) the not so smart version of this size which they thought had failed. after they got this one they discovered the broken one wasn't, just an operators human error. they decided to keep this one because they discovered that smart parts were useful.
customer_reviews.author: just  john

customer_reviews.title: Bangin' TV
customer_reviews.text: The sound could be a liiiittle bit better and it is shipped with the product box not hidden so someone could steal it if you're not home but other than that this is an amazing TV for this price and I'm in love. :)
customer_reviews.author: Underpressure

customer_reviews.title: It was great, very clear through a sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a display case to greet customers with pictures of my food and drink menu items. It was great, very clear through a sunscreen, and able to adjust colors for strong lite from the sun. I will be ordering another one this week as the guy who was working on the computer I attached to the vizio dropped it. It shattered the lower right hand corner of the screen but it still works It is almost indistinguishable behind the sun screen, but not worth any potential problems keeping it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Cats not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a couple of months. The cats are not happy because they lost one of their heat sources :). If you lose power you will have reprogram in Netflix and if on a entertainment console a cat or laundry will block the sensor eye. I do have to regularly adjust the screen size but don't if this due cable, warm up, cats sitting on the controller, or evil house elves. If you have kids, or earthquakes I would recommend something like stand or wall mount to keep from tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Rotten Roger

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for bedroom- very practical and don’t take too much space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vizio not working properly
customer_reviews.text: When turning on the TV I get a white flashing light. Have to turn on and off until the light does not flash. Also the smart TV functions just suddenly stopped working. Cannot get to connect to my WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a Vizio before but have been seeing them in the doctors offices so I decided to try it. Have been very happy so far with the picture and sound and the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: woofNbark

customer_reviews.title: ... wait to write a review for a month I love this TV it's like brand new
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4/28/17 wanted to wait to write a review for a month I love this TV it's like brand new. The price was great. Thank you.😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for a small bedroom or study
customer_reviews.text: I believe I received what I paid for! This is not a top of the line TV. I did not expect it to be.. It is perfect for a small bedroom or study.
customer_reviews.author: SWPhillie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bedroom TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. TV looks slick and discreet. Software does what you'd expect. Quality of image is good enough for a small bedroom TV. Sound is surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan St-Cyr

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work!!! Black screen. Contacted seller and there is a minimum 50% restocking fee!!! And said it will likely be more as the child who got it for Christmas did not save the box. Seriously did not turn on from day one even has cable company and repairman look at it. Said it was a dud. Really!!!poor service
customer_reviews.author: Sky Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tvs and both make popping sounds. Its irrigating to watch tv every 20 minutes. It starts popping.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for price
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price! Easy to use menu options, smart TV needs only 2 wires, HTMI and power cord. The only minor thing, is I wish the remote had "light up" buttons like my other TV, easier to see at night when the lights are out. But it doesn't matter anyway because I can't see a damn thing without my glasses anyway...so...yeah know. I would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: David Blampied

customer_reviews.title: A good investment, and so far
customer_reviews.text: It's a TV. It's 1080p. It has built-in wifi, and I can watch Netflix and Youtube on it, saving me about $50+ a month having to buy cable. A good investment, and so far, seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Invidian

customer_reviews.title: Last long, still looks new.
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV last year in 2017 for Christmas! It still works well and it’s 2018 in July. It has built in Netflix and everything. You can easily hook up your gaming systems etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Greenia

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice t. v but i was one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice t.v but i was one of the unlucky ones and after a few weeks i started getting the white lines across the top of the t.v.
customer_reviews.author: AgaC

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tv for my room and it didn't even last 7 months. And I only used it for Netflix as I do not have cable in my room. Contacted seller and no response! Not happy at all! Visio was going to fix it for free but it's refurbished so they won't help either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the prompt shipping and good TV sets
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the prompt shipping and good TV sets. I bought a 48inch Visio last month for sister in Texas and a 32inch Visio for my Sister's Daughter to take to college. They appreciated and love both TV sets. I'm moving to a new house this month end and will surely order a 55inch - 60inch next month. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Banko

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, even with 1080i cable box and 720p PS3 games. Can't wait to try this puppy out with the PS4 neo with built-in 4k bluray player next year. The tv seems to have done an update last Friday. I wish there was some way to manually check for updates, but haven't found any way to do this yet. Other than that, I love this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Straco

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I do not like is the volume level is low
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I do not like is the volume level is low. I have to turn it all the way up just for it to be at a normal level of sound. Other than that I like it
customer_reviews.author: amber kendall

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO all the way!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic TV! We only buy VIZIO televisions now. The only issue I have had is that I have it on the wall and because of the placement of the speakers, if I have it too loud or there's a lot of bass, it will vibrate the wall and make an annoying sound. I also wish we could re-program the buttons on the controller if we don't use the channels they point to. Otherwise, extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Fine TV, died after 15 months of sporadic use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from Amazon in May 2017. Worked fine. Very nice picture. Used Vizio soundbar for better sound. Stopped working all of a sudden after 15 months of sporadic use (sits in humidity-controlled basement room, mostly used when kids are home from college). Just won't power up anymore. Not a problem with power cable or outlet.
customer_reviews.author: H johnson

customer_reviews.title: My first smart TV, very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My first smart TV, very easy to set up. Easy to use and navigate around using the remote. Great picture. Only problem is the sound is not loud enough in certain circumstances. If there is any background noise (like when I'm watching TV as I walk on a treadmill) I can hear the sound, but the words are not crisp or clear enough. I will have to purchase an additional speaker. Otherwise great TV
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: SUPER DISAPPOINTED! HORRIBLE TV - BARELY OPERATES...NEVER WORKED RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Freezes all the time. Doesn't do real 4k from what I can tell. I got scammed. DONT GET SCAMMED LIKE ME! I should have returned it RIGHT AWAY when it was freezing the first week and has to be reset, however, I already threw the box away like a moron and it became too much work to return it. I'm SUPER disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Seriously Happy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best small/smart tv we have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Crisp picture quality and vibrant colors. Easy to customize features.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D'Augustine

customer_reviews.title: remote
customer_reviews.text: switching between inputs sometimes requires an extra shutting off of screen and restarting. but once connected, all goes well. getting streaming services worked fine, but the process of finding that movie you want is a little slow.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Dana S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO TV, EXCELLENT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I chose a VIZIO TV for a gift because I love the one I bought for myself 6 months ago. It is a great TV with so many features. I never thought I'd love a TV but I go. It came with iHeart Radio which is similar to Pandora and just as awesome. I highly recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have had good luck with Vizio products so I bought this one because of that and the price. It is used every night and we have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bear

customer_reviews.title: could use a remote that last longner then a day and could use side manual buttons to use.
customer_reviews.text: Has a beautiful pitcher and color the remote neve worked well but I use my cable remote for it and works very well. works very well with my PS3. I use the stand that came with it and work very well. wish it had manual buttons on the side so you could also turn it on and off..adjust volume..change channels..etc with out the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one week the shortest life of any tv I have ever purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to be used in the lobby of our local theatre. We display local advertising, concession and merchandise menus too on our TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE COMPACT TV FOR KITCHEN VIEWING - GOOD PICTURE - ...
customer_reviews.text: NICE COMPACT TV FOR KITCHEN VIEWING - GOOD PICTURE - AUDIO NOT VERY GOOD - EASY SETUP - NOT SURE IF I WOULD BUY AGAIN - THE PRICE WAS VERY ATTRACTIVE - GOOD SHIPPING - ARRIVED SAFE AND SOUND
customer_reviews.author: Elge S. Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and shows great pictures, only non issue is that it takes a short while at start up
customer_reviews.author: Clyde S Zackery

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Colors look weak and unnatural. t is as if they knew it because there is extremely large number of settings for the color, but even after spending hours trying to adjust, the result is just bearable. It does have WiFi, and you can watch Youtube and Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Dario D.

customer_reviews.title: Vizio 24" TV
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit small for a 24" TV. Shows a good picture and has all the features I wanted. Could of had a better stand
customer_reviews.author: Richard Raleigh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality, after more than a year sound broke, remote is not very accurate and smart tv is very slow
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G.

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's good, had it for nearly a year, no problems. The apps sorta suck on it though. And sometimes it doesn't really look 4k but when u put for 4k videos on YouTube you can tell the difference. It's big enough for a teens bedroom and gaming on it look good.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. For about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a tv with such amazing picture. I've had one other Vizio tv before this one and was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the picture on it. This one is no different. The built in apps load quickly, the remote is great. Update: After having this TV for 6 months the HDMI port for the 60hz 4K input stopped working. Also the TV loses its WiFi settings constantly and has to be set up again about once a month. I would definitely go for another brand of higher quality. Reduced my rating to two stars. This is a spate tv for the bedroom. No longer watch anything in 4K on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Overall good picture quality and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall good picture quality and value for the money. 1 star is deducted for the poor quality directions as it was not made clear regarding the specific cable cord going from the wall outlet was supposed to be connected to the small cable box and not the TV itself.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: extremely satisfied. Crisp picture
customer_reviews.text: For the price, extremely satisfied. Crisp picture, but the volume a bit low, so I just have to save up for a soundbar :)
customer_reviews.author: DasDude

product_meta.title: VIZIO D40-D1 D-Series 40 Inch 1920 x 1080 Class Full Array LED Smart TV (Black)
product_meta.description:
Size:40"| Style:LED Smart TV1. VIZIO Internet apps Plus - instantly enjoy the latest hit movies, TV shows, music and even more premium apps straight from the internet to your TV. 2. Full-array LED backlight - distributes LEDs behind the entire screen delivering superior light uniformity and picture performance. 3. Built-in Wi-Fi - connect with high-speed wireless for easy, clutter-free access to VIZIO Internet apps Plus. 4. Clear action 240 - enhanced motion clarity with 60 Hz effective refresh rate and powerful image processing for stunning sharp detail in sports and fast action scenes. 5. 1080P Full HD resolution - enjoy high-definition TV with a crystal-clear picture.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 1. VIZIO Internet Apps Plus - Instantly enjoy the latest hit movies, TV shows, music and even more premium apps straight from the Internet to your TV.
2. Full-Array LED Backlight - Distributes LEDs behind the entire screen delivering superior light uniformity and picture performance.
3. Built-in Wi-Fi - Connect with high-speed wireless for easy, clutter-free access to VIZIO Internet Apps Plus.
4. Clear Action 240 - Enhanced motion clarity with 60 Hz effective refresh rate and powerful image processing for stunning sharp detail in sports and fast action scenes.
5. 1080p Full HD resolution - Enjoy high-definition TV with a crystal-clear picture.
